title: GCD Product Sum
text: In this problem, you will be givenqqueries (1 ≤q≤ 1 000 000). Each query will contain a single integern(1 ≤n≤ 1 000 000).For each query you have to output the following:InputFirst line will contain the number of queriesq. Nextqlines will contain a single integern.OutputOutput the answer for each query in a new line.ExampleInput:44679Output:246370135Explanation:For second query (n=6):1*gcd(1,6)+2*gcd(2,6)+3*gcd(3,6)+4*gcd(4,6)+5*gcd(5,6)+6*gcd(6,6)1*1+2*2+3*3+4*2+5*1+6*61+4+9+8+5+36=63
